content: you should now have a total of 45 46 48 51 53 56 59 60 63 64 stitches on your needles knit another 10 9 9 6 5 8 7 7 4 5 rounds or until you reach 4 in 10 cm before your preferred length you will now work the cuff of the sleeve switch to your us size 7 4 5 mm needles or smaller needles sizes 1 4 5 7 and 9 only you will work one decrease on the first round of the ribbing to get an even number of stitches ribbing r1 *k1 p1* repeat from * to * until 3 st remain k1 p2tog all sizes cont d knit around in 1x1 rib k1 p1 until the length of your cuff measures 4 in 10 cm bind off using italian bind-off or your preferred stretchy cast off method repeat for the second sleeve finishing weave in all ends and block your regina pullover is now done tag me at @em knits_ on instagram and use the hashtag #reginapullover if you post a picture for any questions or pattern help please reach out to support@emknits co em knits © copyright 2025 7
